text: Yang Yuanqing (; born 12 November 1964) is the current CEO and chairman of Lenovo, a Chinese computer company. == Biography == Yang earned an bachelor's degree from Shanghai Jiao Tong University and a master's degree from the University of Science and Technology of China. == References == Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:People from Anhui
title: Yang Yuanqing
